Wen-Chieh Fang

My research interests include data science, machine learning, time-series analysis, and Informatics of traditional Chinese medicine.

Some current topics of interest are:

  • Deep learning
  • Survival analysis
  • Social networks
  • Recommender systems
  • Computational cognition
